an10.134:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you what is good and what is not good.
an10.134:1.2: Listen and apply your mind well, I will speak.”
an10.134:2.2: Wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.134:2.3: This is called what is not good.
an10.134:2.5: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.134:2.6: This is called what is good.”
